evidence.claim: Corgi Insurance leverages AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA regulations and utilizes X12 transaction sets for insurance claims.
Integration with Stripe for payment processing is accomplished via their API, maintaining security best practices.
Corgi uses Twilio for communication functionalities, integrated as part of their workflow.
